channel.title: FrozenAge - BETA
channel.description:
Opening up early for some beta testing.
Looking for a lot of things to be tested; appreciate all who can contribute.
Players will be rewarded with a rank based upon their activity logged during the beta (not anything special; just for display).
[url=http://frozenage.org/showthread.php?t=16]Current progress[/url] | [url=http://frozenage.org/forumdisplay.php?f=9]Bug reports[/url]
[ul][li][url=http://frozenage.org/forumdisplay.php?f=8]Beta forum[/url][/li] [list] [li][url=http://frozenage.org/showthread.php?t=31]Read me post[/url][/li] [/list][/ul]
[size=10pt]Note: The server is incomplete, but playable, and the purpose of this is for testing current content.[/size]
Ready to come check things out?
[url=http://frozenage.org/play.php]Play on the webclient[/url] or [url=http://frozenage.org/play.php?download]Download the client[/url]
[size=10pt]View pictures below[/size]
[COLOR=lime]Finished[/COLOR] | [COLOR=yellow]In Progress[/COLOR] | [COLOR=maroon]Not Started[/COLOR]

item.title: FrozenAge - BETA
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Yeah definitely not the right thread haha

Read full topic

item.title: FrozenAge - BETA
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

Dave is pro:

this servers recently had an update i disagree with. Its made PVP crap. Welfare is all people pk in now :palm:. No thanks, Bye hated/bravey. Its been a fun ride

PvP was Hyperion’s basic combat, are you sure you’re on the right thread?

Read full topic

item.title: FrozenAge - BETA
item.dc:creator: @Dave_is_pro Dave is pro
item.description:
@Dave_is_pro wrote:

this servers recently had an update i disagree with. Its made PVP crap. Welfare is all people pk in now :palm:. No thanks, Bye hated/bravey. Its been a fun ride

Read full topic

item.title: FrozenAge - BETA
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

Zombie Juice:

Are there highscores?

Not at the moment, no.

And Soulcist; well, vBulletin was the best option, since I know it well, for writing hooks and such.

Originally, we were going to get a team together to write a forum system, but it was decided against.

Read full topic

item.title: FrozenAge - BETA
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Looks like a fantastic server, if I have time then I’ll come online and see what it’s like - great job again.

Not the biggest fan of the forums as I thought they were forumotion until I looked at the bottom but not that big of a deal at this point.

Read full topic

item.title: FrozenAge - BETA
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

Thanks Kongo, just reset everything, removing commands.

Most collecting skills work, which can be found under the progress section, we’re looking for those to be tested.

Read full topic

item.title: FrozenAge - BETA
item.dc:creator: @Kongo Kongo
item.description:
@Kongo wrote:

Looks like it’s going to be a great server can’t wait to fully test it out when the commands and stuff have been removed!

Read full topic

item.title: FrozenAge - BETA
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

sinisoul:

Well, how awesome. I’m glad this is out. You shall see me online.

Great to hear, we’re starting to finish a lot up to remove commands for levels and items, for a better testing experience.

Read full topic

item.title: FrozenAge - BETA
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Well, how awesome. I’m glad this is out. You shall see me online.

Read full topic

Opening up early for some beta testing.

Looking for a lot of things to be tested; appreciate all who can contribute.

Players will be rewarded with a rank based upon their activity logged during the beta (not anything special; just for display).
